title: [Health] A higher intake of fruits, vegetables and plant-based foods reduces the risk of cognitive impairment in the elderly

[Epidemiology] Research has found medical masks without modification blocked >56% of cough aerosols and >42% of exhaled aerosols; comparatively, placing a cloth mask over a medical mask blocked ≥85% of cough aerosols and ≥91% of exhaled aerosols
